page.title: 02LOCAL OPINIONS
page.content: {LOCAL OPINIONS} In a survey of peoples opinions about Alne we found that everyone was satisfied with the village but one person said that there should be kerb stones along the sides of the roads and more street lamps on both sides of the street. A lot of the old people said that the village could'nt be improved. Nearly everyone said the {bus service was very good but one old man was disappointed about the buses being stopped on a Sunday.Some people said there should be a playing field or something for the children to play safely,and some that said there should be a mini supermarket.Some people said that the village had improved since 1940,and think that Alne is one of the prettiest {villages in North {Yorkshire. }
